name: PumpedKins
description:
PumpedKins is a platformer puzzle game in which you play as Plumpy; rescuing the poor pumpkins and meet with witchy to go home! Are you ready for some good mind puzzlin puzzlez???

CREDITS

www.atthewpablo.com

www.soundcloud.com/yoshbeatsstereotype

www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com

If you like me lil games please check out my profile to know more!!

(and for any bugs that you discover >.< )

THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR PLAYING!!
